intro: Ouratea mildbraedii, commonly known as the mildbraed's ouratea, is a species of flowering plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its slender, erect stems and simple, opposite leaves. Its flowers are small, clustered in inflorescences, and typically have four to five petals. It is often found in shaded, moist environments within tropical forests.
